name: Attuned_Command_of_the_Mastermind_F
display_name: Attuned Command of the Mastermind F
display_fullname: Boosts.Attuned Command of the Mastermind F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Grants you a 40' radius aura which increases your Henchmen's AoE Defense by 10% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
power_display_names: Command of the Mastermind: Recharge/Pet +AoE Defense Aura
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Pet +AoE Defense Aura
